prompt: Create a blog website and use sample blog posts and images.
refinedPrompt: Create a blog website with a clean and modern design. Include a home page featuring the latest blog posts, an about page with information about the blog's purpose and author, and individual blog post pages with engaging content and relevant images. Implement a search functionality and categories for easy navigation. Use sample blog posts covering various topics and include appropriate images to enhance the visual appeal. Ensure the website is responsive and optimized for different devices.
